quote: With heightened senses it remained motionless and looked through bulbous eyes. It could taste fear in the air. Pheromones. Sweat. Food was near, but more importantly, so was its new home.
quote_letters: WITH HEIGHTENED SENSES IT REMAINED MOTIONLESS AND LOOKED THROUGH BULBOUS EYES IT COULD TASTE FEAR IN THE AIR PHEROMONES SWEAT FOOD WAS NEAR BUT MORE IMPORTANTLY SO WAS ITS NEW HOME
